about_the_game:
Red Dragon Pack


This product depicts 39 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games.

The pack consists of red dragons of different ages. Included are young red dragons, fighting, in flight and sleeping. Adult red dragons in flight, sleeping and in combat. Also saddled with and without a rider. Ancient dragons fighting, sleeping and in flight. The dragon rider separate. Chests of various kinds, hordes of gold and treasure, rubies and other coins. Included is a Red Dragon Flame breath to scare your enemies to death as it breaths across the battlefield.

This pack includes the following:

  • Young red dragons fighting, in flight, and sleeping
  • Adult red dragons in flight, sleeping, in combat, and saddled with and without a rider
  • Ancient dragons fighting, sleeping, and in flight
  • Dragon rider
  • Chests of various kinds
  • Hordes of gold and treasure
  • Rubies and other coins
  • Red dragon flame breath template

Converted by: Kiel Thompson

Released on September 13, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
